dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.description: Lets you build groups of accessors
dependencies.name: perl-class-accessor-grouped

dependencies.description: Load mix-ins or components to your C3-based class
dependencies.name: perl-class-c3-componentised

dependencies.description: Get information about a class and its structure
dependencies.name: perl-class-inspector

dependencies.description: Load configuration from different file formats, transparently
dependencies.name: perl-config-any

dependencies.description:
Run code after a subroutine call, preserving the context the subroutine
would have seen if it were the last statement in the caller
dependencies.name: perl-context-preserve

dependencies.description: Less indentation and newlines plus sub deparsing
dependencies.name: perl-data-dumper-concise

dependencies.description: DBD::SQLite - Self-contained RDBMS in a DBI Driver
dependencies.name: perl-dbd-sqlite

dependencies.description:
The DBI is the standard database interface module for Perl. It defines a
set of methods, variables and conventions that provide a consistent
database interface independent of the actual database being used.
dependencies.name: perl-dbi

dependencies.description: Makes Perl's global destruction less tricky to deal with
dependencies.name: perl-devel-globaldestruction

dependencies.description: Hash::Merge merges two arbitrarily deep hashes into a single hash.
dependencies.name: perl-hash-merge

dependencies.description: Find and use installed modules in a (sub)category
dependencies.name: perl-module-find

dependencies.description: Moo - Minimalist Object Orientation (with Moose compatibility)
dependencies.name: perl-moo

dependencies.description: Provides several utilities for dealing with method resolution order.
dependencies.name: perl-mro-compat

dependencies.description: Keep imports and functions out of your namespace.
dependencies.name: perl-namespace-clean

dependencies.description: Routines for manipulating stashes
dependencies.name: perl-package-stash

dependencies.description: Cross-platform path specification manipulation
dependencies.name: perl-path-class

dependencies.description: Lexically-scoped resource management
dependencies.name: perl-scope-guard

dependencies.description: Generate SQL from Perl data structures
dependencies.name: perl-sql-abstract-classic

dependencies.description: Name or rename a sub
dependencies.name: perl-sub-name

dependencies.description: Extremely flexible deep comparison
dependencies.name: perl-test-deep

dependencies.description: Test exception-based code
dependencies.name: perl-test-exception

dependencies.description: Perl extension to test methods for warnings
dependencies.name: perl-test-warn

dependencies.description: Minimal try/catch with proper preservation of $@
dependencies.name: perl-try-tiny

description: Extensible and flexible object <-> relational mapper.
name: perl-dbix-class
